channel.title: [?][317][Delta] characterfile write [Delta][317][?]
channel.description:
i want to make a new line like starter. i call it gift....
now i copy all starter things... and change it with gift. but i have one question
[code] characterfile.write("character-starter = ", 0, 20); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(starter), 0, Integer.toString(starter).length()); [/code]
what means this 20 :o [code]("character-starter = ", 0, 20); [/code]
i need to change this to something? or just copy all?
grts, Mr Tekkah

item.title: [?][317][Delta] characterfile write [Delta][317][?]
item.dc:creator: @KoF KoF
item.description:
@KoF wrote:

[quote=“rova1, post:2, topic:376313”]"character-starter = "

That’s 20 characters long (don’t count the speech marks/quote), do count the spaces[/quote]
ok thanks

Read full topic

item.title: [?][317][Delta] characterfile write [Delta][317][?]
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

"character-starter = "

That’s 20 characters long (don’t count the speech marks/quote), do count the spaces
